template.description:
Use the Slack Blame plugin to send a message to a Slack channel or through direct message when a build completes. You will need to supply Drone with an access token to the Slack API. You can create a new access token at [https://api.slack.com/web](https://api.slack.com/web).
Documentation is available here: https://plugins.drone.io/plugins/
NOTE: Setting mapping is not included due to unsupported variable type
NOTE: Setting success_image_attachments is not included due to unsupported variable type
NOTE: Setting failure_image_attachments is not included due to unsupported variable type
template.name: Slack Blame
